verses.name: Psalms 89:15
verses.text: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: they shall walk, O Lord, in the light of thy countenance.

verses.name: Psalms 89:16
verses.text: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day: and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted.

verses.name: Psalms 89:17
verses.text: For thou art the glory of their strength: and in thy favour our horn shall be exalted.

verses.name: Psalms 89:18
verses.text: For the Lord is our defence; and the Holy One of Israel is our king.

verses.name: Psalms 89:19
verses.text: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
